issue.message: Field `METADATA_EXCLUSIVE_MANAGER` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.supportExclusiveManager())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `?` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_SUPPORT_EXCLUSIVE_MANAGER) to transfer requirement to caller`)
issue.errorLine1: private static final int METADATA_MAX_KEY = METADATA_EXCLUSIVE_MANAGER;
